data.text: @undertheseen Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Paolo. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@_nada_mas_ Hi mwel! Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, . To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@Nhelsieh5 Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, @Nhelsieh5. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@bibliyowbibuli Hi @bibliyowbubuli, thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt. Note that you may also send your concern thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSJklK). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.

If these are done on-the-spot, our ground staff are on standby to assist affected guests.

For other questions or concerns, passengers may send a message via Charlie the chatbot on https://t.co/SCMZemThl1
We recommend our customers to check the status of their flight via https://t.co/n8RpsOuboq before going to the airport. CEB will do its best to inform guests ahead of time if flights are cancelled.

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text:
Manila, Boracay, Kalibo, Roxas, Iloilo, Tacloban, Cotabato, Legazpi, Naga, Virac, Masbate, and San Jose.

We thank our passengers for their patience and understanding as we normalize schedules.
CEB is also offering until October 31 flexible options, which include free rebooking and travel fund, to passengers who wish to postpone their flights to the following destinations:

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Publisher & News Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to  marketing and advertiser agencies, publishers of magazines, newspapers, blogs, books

data.text:
2. Travel Fund
Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.).

3. Refund
The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

1. Free Rebooking
Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if the travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
They may avail themselves of their preferred option online up to two (2) hours before their scheduled time of departure.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR.

5J 637/638 Manila – Puerto Princesa – Manila
5J 617/618 Manila – Tagbilaran – Manila
5J 655/656 Manila – Tacloban – Manila

5J 567/568 Manila – Cebu – Manila
5J 963/964 Manila – Davao – Manila
5J 383/384 Manila – Cagayan de Oro – Manila
5J 571/572 Manila – Cebu – Manila

As a result of the operational challenges, CEB cancelled flights on October 31, 2022:

Flight Number Route
5J 473/474 Manila – Bacolod – Manila
5J 451/452 Manila – Iloilo – Manila
5J 893/894 Manila – Caticlan (Boracay) – Manila
5J 627/628 Manila – Dumaguete – Manila

Cebu Pacific Advisory #7

Cancelled Flights on October 31 in the aftermath of Tropical Storm Paeng (Nalgae)
As of October 30, 2022, 8:30PM

Cebu Pacific (CEB) is currently restoring its operations in the aftermath of Tropical Storm Paeng (Nalgae). https://t.co/J0kB1Vb5J9

data.text: @Boilingmadph I'm sorry to hear this Boilingmad. Please do the following troubleshooting & try again. -Clear your browser's cache & cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Use Google Chrome browser if possible. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated.

@barbet2022 We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience 
Elle. At any time after a booking has been made, we may change our schedules and/or cancel any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security.

data.text: @lexaliko I'm sorry to hear this Lex. We're moving all of our chat engagements. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

@hellokimnini We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience elle 🧸.  We may change our schedules and/or cancel any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security. View your options https://t.co/k9grG8YJsw.

If these are done on-the-spot, our ground staff are on standby to assist affected guests.

For other questions or concerns, passengers may send a message via Charlie the chatbot on https://t.co/SCMZemThl1
We continue to monitor the situation across all the airports we fly to Everyjuan’s safety remains our top priority. CEB will do its best to inform guests ahead of time if flights are cancelled.

This is a developing situation so there may be flight delays and schedule changes throughout the day. We recommend our passengers to check the status of their flight via https://t.co/n8RpsOuboq before going to the airport.

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: · October 30-31: all flights touching Manila, Boracay, Kalibo, Roxas, Iloilo, Tacloban, Cotabato, Legazpi, Naga, Virac, Masbate, and San Jose
CEB is also offering flexible options, which include free rebooking and travel fund, to passengers who wish to postpone their flights to certain destinations during the following dates:

3. Refund
The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

data.text:
2. Travel Fund
Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.).

1. Free Rebooking
Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if the travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
They may avail themselves of their preferred option online up to two (2) hours before their scheduled time of departure.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR

5J 655/656 Manila – Tacloban – Manila
5J 637/638 Manila – Puerto Princesa – Manila
5J 897/898 Manila – Caticlan (Boracay) – Manila
